thread.title: Four more Transformers films will be released over the next ten years - Movies
thread.title_full: Four more Transformers films will be released over the next ten years - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Four more Transformers films will be released over the next ten years - Movies
text: The president of Hasbro Studios has revealed that four more Transformers films will be released over the next ten years.Speaking at Cannes yesterday (October 3), Stephen Davis said that the studio would also develop a Transformers TV franchise over the course of the next decade. "You're going to see a new Transformers movie coming from Hasbro and Paramount and Michael Bay and our other partners," he said. "We decided that we wanted to plot out the next 10 years of Transformers... similarly, we are doing the same in television and in digital. So stay tuned, Transformers 5 is on its way, and 6 and 7 and 8."The news follows the revelations that the Transformers cinematic universe is set to expand in the style of Marvel, with Hasbro's CEO Brian Goldner speaking about the possibility of individual characters - such as Bumblebee - getting their own films.It has previously been reported that Transformers executives have been in talks about how to create further sequels and spin-offs as part of the franchise.The most recent movie in the Transformers franchise, Age of Extinction, was released in 2014.
